title: How can I stream the movie on BMS Stream App using Fire TV Stick? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Allow us to explain this to you.
Simply download BookMyShow Stream App on your Tv.
Once downloaded, you will see a screen that will have steps to guide you to log in.
Login URL will be available with a Unique code to enter. Enter this login URL on your Phone or Computer
URL will be
https://in.bookmyshow.com/activate
and just below the URL you will see an activation code that needs to be entered on your phone or computer.
Once done, log in using the contact details used at the time of booking, you can see your booking under purchases.
That's it. You are all set!
Happy streaming!
